params.taskDescription:
What is the probability of drawing a <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi mathvariant="normal">♣<!-- ♣ --></mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\clubsuit</annotation></semantics></math> and a <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi mathvariant="normal">♠<!-- ♠ --></mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\spadesuit</annotation></semantics></math> (in any order)?

questionSetStimulus:

    <mtext>A</mtext>
  </mrow>

  </mrow>
